[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [FileSystem](./node-core-library.filesystem.md) &gt; [writeFile](./node-core-library.filesystem.writefile.md)

## FileSystem.writeFile() method

Writes a text string to a file on disk, overwriting the file if it already exists. Behind the scenes it uses `fs.writeFileSync()`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static writeFile(filePath: string, contents: string | Buffer, options?: IFileSystemWriteFileOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

filePath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The absolute or relative path of the file.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

contents


</td><td>

string \| Buffer


</td><td>

The text that should be written to the file.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[IFileSystemWriteFileOptions](./node-core-library.ifilesystemwritefileoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional settings that can change the behavior. Type: `IWriteFileOptions`


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Throws an error if the folder doesn't exist, unless ensureFolder=true.
